mapper.update: UPDATE ems_class c LEFT JOIN ems_profession p ON c.professionId_n = p.professionId_n SET c.active_c = 'F' WHERE p.facultyId_n = #{facultyId, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND c.active_c = 'A'
UPDATE ems_class SET active_c = 'P' WHERE professionId_n = #{professionId, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND (active_c = 'A' OR active_c = 'F')
UPDATE ems_class c LEFT JOIN ems_profession p ON c.professionId_n = p.professionId_n SET c.active_c = 'A' WHERE p.facultyId_n = #{facultyId, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND c.active_c = 'F'
UPDATE ems_class SET active_c = 'A' WHERE professionId_n = #{professionId, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND active_c = 'P'
